name: file-tree-to-text-generator
description: Print the selected directory within it's files and subdirectories as text (multiple formats available)

tree-generator.defaultDepth.title: Depth
tree-generator.defaultDepth.description: Set the default max depth of the generated tree

tree-generator.maxFilesInSubtree.title: Max. files per in tree / subtree
tree-generator.maxFilesInSubtree.description: Set a max. value for the amount of files in a tree or subtree. Set this to 0 equals no limitation

tree-generator.maxDirsInSubtree.title: Max. directories per in tree / subtree
tree-generator.maxDirsInSubtree.description: Set a max. value for the amount of directories in a tree or subtree. Set this to 0 equals no limitation

tree-generator.defaultTarget.title: Default Target
tree-generator.defaultTarget.description: Set your default output target. It is just respected if prompt is disabled.

tree-generator.prompt.title: Prompt
tree-generator.prompt.description: Choose if the user will be promt or if the default settings will  be applied

tree-generator.dirsOnly.title: Only directories
tree-generator.dirsOnly.description: Define if only directories will be part of the result

tree-generator.targets.title: Customize target formats
tree-generator.targets.description: Configure the output targets and adjust the configuration for tree items

items.title: Format
items.description: Define the format for the generated tree

picker.title: Prompt configuration
picker.description: Configure the prompt for the user

label.title: Prompt label for the target format
label.description: The short label for the target format

description.title: Prompt description for the target format
description.description: A description for the target format that will be displayed to the user

beforeTree.title: Text before the tree
beforeTree.description: Define a text (HTML) which will be added before the tree items

afterTree.title: Text after the tree
afterTree.description: Define a text (HTML) which will be added after the tree items

indent.title: Indentation
indent.description: Set a string for indent per level of the tree

indentParentDirIsLast.title: Indentation for parent elements without next items
indentParentDirIsLast.description: Set a string for indent which is used prefered if set and if the parent element is the last in it's subtree (not further siblings)

masks.title: Masks configuration
masks.description: Configure the masks for tree items

root.title: The mask for the first (root) item
root.description:
Use the placeholders #0, #1 amd #2 which will be replaces as with the following content:
 #0 : Insert the tree level number
 #1 : Insert the name of the file or directory
 #2 : Insert the relative path to the file or directory starting from the selected directory
 Example: '#0: [#1](.#2)' becomes '1: [file1.txt](./path/to/file/file1.txt)'
